game_start.speaker: Narrator
game_start.text: Welcome to your adventure! You find yourself in a peaceful meadow, ready to begin your journey.

first_exploration.speaker: Narrator
first_exploration.text: The meadow stretches before you. You notice a crystal glowing in the distance and what appears to be a chest nearby.

crystal_discovery.speaker: Narrator
crystal_discovery.text: As you approach the crystal, it begins to glow brighter. You feel a strange energy emanating from it.

power_awakening.speaker: Narrator
power_awakening.text: The crystal's energy flows through you! You have awakened the power of Telekinesis. You can now move objects with your mind.

chest_discovery.speaker: Narrator
chest_discovery.text: You open the chest and find a health potion and some gold coins inside.

first_dialogue.speaker: Mysterious Voice
first_dialogue.text: Welcome, traveler. Your journey has just begun. There are many secrets to discover in this world.

voice_identity.speaker: Mysterious Voice
voice_identity.text: I am a guide, here to help you understand your growing powers. You will learn more as you progress.

secrets_hint.speaker: Mysterious Voice
secrets_hint.text: Ancient powers lie dormant in this land. Crystals like the one you found will awaken abilities within you.

power_explanation.speaker: Mysterious Voice
power_explanation.text: Each power you gain will help you overcome different challenges. Use them wisely, and they will serve you well.
